mapper.select: SELECT ADVERTISE_SEQ, ADVERTISE_MONEY, ADVERTISE_FILE, ADVERTISER, ADVERTISER_PHONE, SITE, TO_CHAR(CONTRACT_PERIOD,'yyyy-MM-dd') "CONTRACT_PERIOD", TO_CHAR(CONTRACT_ENDPERIOD, 'yyyy-MM-dd') "CONTRACT_ENDPERIOD", TRUNC((contract_endperiod-contract_period), 0)as remain FROM ADVERTISEMENT WHERE ADVERTISE_SEQ = #{advertiseSeq}
SELECT a.*, TRUNC((contract_endperiod-contract_period), 0) "remain" FROM ADVERTISEMENT a ORDER BY ADVERTISE_SEQ
SELECT ADVERTISER "name", sum(advertise_money) "sum" FROM ADVERTISEMENT GROUP BY ADVERTISER
select substr(contract_period,4,2)"month", count(substr(contract_period,4,2)) "cnt" from ADVERTISEMENT group by (substr(contract_period,4,2)) order by 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADVERTISEMENT ( ADVERTISE_SEQ, ADVERTISE_MONEY, ADVERTISE_FILE, ADVERTISER, ADVERTISER_PHONE, SITE, CONTRACT_PERIOD, CONTRACT_ENDPERIOD ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ADVERTISE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM ADVERTISEMENT), #{advertiseMoney}, #{advertiseFile}, #{advertiser}, #{advertiserPhone}, #{site}, #{contractPeriod}, #{contractENDPeriod} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ADVERTISEMENT SET ADVERTISE_MONEY = #{advertiseMoney} , ADVERTISE_FILE = #{advertiseFile}, ADVERTISER = #{advertiser}, ADVERTISER_PHONE = #{advertiserPhone}, SITE = #{site}, CONTRACT_PERIOD = #{contractPeriod}, CONTRACT_ENDPERIOD = #{contractENDPeriod} WHERE ADVERTISE_SEQ = #{advertiseSeq}
